short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional functionality to Castle Learning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your learning experience on Castle Learning with features such as question copying and question searching

Copy the current question to your clipboard and/or search the web for the current question in a few clicks!
